ygData.subject: Re: Weapon choices..
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings and Welcome!!! Thanks for the analysis.  I am kinda math stoopid so like which is better? Also, you say that procs are not factored in - is that
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings and Welcome!!!

Thanks for the analysis. I am kinda math stoopid so like which is better?

Also, you say that procs are not factored in - is that reasonable? I now
use 2 Yk's and they proc quite nicely thank you <g> 75dd is a nice addition
to any melee!

We are glad to have you and welcome your posts. A couple people here are
real good at numbers and me.... well lets just say that I have to take my
Lambent boots off to do any kinda complicated maths.

Keep us posted on the best weps for each level - also remember that it's
kinda hard to get the uber-weps at young levels - so sometimes what is best
for one is totally out of reach for others. And some weps that proc are
maybe not that useful until they do proc (I think your Yk analysis kinda
says that no?)

See ya,

Sylly SongSynger
Bardette of 46 songs
<The Pantheon>
somewhere on Innoruuk...

----- Original Message -----
From: Rob Noble <rnoble001@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2000 7:11 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapon choices..


> From: Rob Noble <rnoble001@...>
>
> Greetings.
>
> Just joined the list today, and I happened to notice a thread that I'd
> posted on at the Concert Hall Website
> (http://www.attcanada.net/~reaper/) regarding weapon effectivness.
>

> When you look at this on a spreadsheet, it makes some really interesing
> facts come to life, such as:
> Compare Bladed Thulian Claws to a Silvery War Axe at both Lvl 25 and
> then at 50.
> LVL 25 LVL 50
> Thulian Claws 37 18
> Silvery War Axe 34 24
>
> Or take the Mithrill Quill compared to a Obsidian Shard
> LVL 25 LVL 50
> Mith Quill 88 36
> Obsidian Shard 54 42
>
> Or, one of the most shocking IMHO.
> LVL 25 LVL 50
> SS o Ykesha 17 17
> Shark Tooth 31 14
>
